name: You Are Mr. Shooty Pistols, the Fastest Gun in the West. Can You Collect the Bounty on Chester Cheetah?
name_original: You Are Mr. Shooty Pistols, the Fastest Gun in the West. Can You Collect the Bounty on Chester Cheetah?
description: Chester Cheetah's on the loose again, robbing banks and pooping in public! Do you have what it takes to capture that cheesy menace?
